titleStmt.title: A search after souls and spiritual operations in man
titleStmt.author: Layton, Henry, 1622-1705.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Layton by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
In 2 pts. Second pt. has caption title: A second part of a treatise intituled A search after souls.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
